name: Pirate Ship Puzzles
description:
You and your crew are lost at sea!  Look ahead and try to follow the current to land again.  Be sure to avoid the dangers that lurk at sea.

Controls:
WASD or Arrow Keys to move the ship to an adjacent square

Upcoming updates:
       Arrows  to show which way you can move
       Sounds and SFX
       More Levels!
       Touch support for a possible android build

Made for Weekly Game Jam 143 - Running Water

Updates:

V 0.2.3 - Minor update and a new Level
V 0.2.1 - Added a basic menu - V 0.2.2 - Fixed a minor mistake
V 0.1.1 - Initial game post with 12 playable levels.
